  • ARTIST WORKS

    关于

上升空间 Climbing Space

从90年代开始,艺术家频繁往来于国际间参加各种展览，这一系列取材于艺术家自己拍摄的世界各地的机场以及和艺术相关的空间场所的照片。艺术家通过将旅途中时间空间片断复制成油画的过程表现了当时艺术家感觉自己事业向高处攀升的某种微妙心理感受的隐喻。

Since the beginning of 1999, the artist has travelled back and forth, participating in international exhibitions. The series consists of pictures the artist took of airports from around the world, as well as photographs taken of spaces related to art. The artist reproduced fragments of time and spaces he travelled on his journey into paintings. During this period, the artist sensed that his career was slowly progressing upwards and the work is a metaphorical response to his psychological state at the time.

现场 Exhibition Scene
